item.title: Research
item.description: [Dissertation] – RFSoC My doctroal research concentrates on designing a wideband digital receiver system to receive and process the data for accurate multiple signal detection. Fast Fourier transform (FFT) is a widely used digital signal processing technique to detect signals in a bandwidth. However, there are some limitations when using the FFT algorithm for signal detection The number of fixed-length samples used by the FFT algorithm determines the frequency resolution. The number of samples from the input signal must be increased to increase the frequency resolution.
